name: European University Hospital Alliance
membership: The European University Hospital Alliance is not a member of any other networks or associations
goal:
EUHA’s vision is to build a network of sustainable healthcare ecosystems in Europe which achieve the best possible quality of care with the resources available.
To support this EUHA has formulated the following mission statements :

- To promote excellence and innovation in healthcare, research and education, by comparing practices and patient outcomes, providing knowledge exchange opportunities for staff, and collaborating in research and development projects.
- To emphasize the essential role of university hospitals within health systems by formulating and offering advice to policymakers and interacting with industry, patient organisations and other health care stakeholders.

EUHA will act only and directly for non-profit purposes, and, thus, will not predominantly pursue economic goals.
The funds of EUHA shall be used only for the purposes provided for in the present Articles of Association.
The association has no political or religious orientation.
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
